title: Thimin lei a tuam laiin
lyrics:
Thimin lei a tuam laiin,
Van engin piallei a chhun;
Vanhu zai mawi a lo ri,
"Rem leng se," tiin an zai.
"Chungnung berah Pathian chu,

Ropui takin awm rawh se;
Lei chunga mihring hnenah,
Lei chunga mhring hnenah
Rem leng se," tiin an zai.

Puan eng var rupui sinin,
Bethlehem dai phul lengah;
Chhandamtu lo pianga chu,
Chawimawi nan hla thar an sa.

Van mite an her liam a
Thangvan sang an kai hnu chuan
Beramputen khawharin
Bethlehem dai reh an nghak

Keini pawh van mite u,
Berampute ang khanin;
"Leiah rem leng se," tiin,
Min zaipui ve dawn law'm ni?
